about_the_game:
Fight your way through silly stumbling enemies, strong, weak, fast, slow, invisible? Yep.

A simple concept; just use your grapple and any weapons you find!
No complex tricks, no reloads, just shoot (or beat, freeze, taser, chop, throw, blow) em down!

Speed through the Time Trials, get the best time you can!

Mess with tons of unique and unconventional weapons in the Sandbox Level!

Try to survive as long as possible in Horde Mode!

Suggest new weapon ideas! This game is shaped by the players too!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 2600 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan Capable GPU, AMD RX 570 / Nvidia GTX 1060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: 6DOF OpenXR Headset
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070 or Higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
